title: I Want to Protect my Dark Appeal!
detail_text: <:th_ch0106/>So you’ve come, welcome, to the twilight party room….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>E-, excuse me!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>To have set foot in here means you’ve willingly put yourself to fall. You’re prepared for that…. aren’t you?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Y-, yes! I want to study your dark appeals, Yoshiko-chan! Even if I have to…. fall? for it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Kukuku. Even those who bear the character “sun” in their name cannot resist the allure of darkness…. Darkness shall engulf everything…. Also, it’s Yohane, okay….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Ah, sorry, Yohane-chan. Also, umm, I heard this from Ayumu-san, but is it true that you’re being chased by angels? Aren’t you worried about being a school idol in such a dangerous condition?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Hah? From Ayumu….?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Yeah. Ayumu-san was really worried…. She talked about how “If Yoshiko-chan is in danger, we should all help her”<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Uhh…. How far has that story spread?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Eh? I don’t really know…. But me, Rin-chan, and Maki-chan all know<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
